name: Rio Rex
description: There's a T-Rex on the loose in Rio city! Take on the role of the destructive dino as you attempt to incinerate everyone and everything on your path of destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.7Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 90 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Dual Core 2.3Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 90 MB available space
